automatedPolicyAvailability.policyName: Azure Cache for Redis should use private link
automatedPolicyAvailability.policyDescription: Private endpoints lets you connect your virtual network to Azure services without a public IP address at the source or destination. By mapping private endpoints to your Azure Cache for Redis instances, data leakage risks are reduced. Learn more at: https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-cache-for-redis/cache-private-link.
